sentences.english: The downstream region of the Yellow River in Shandong province is serious illness area of endemic fluorosis.
sentences.chinese: 山東省黃河下游流域是山東省高碘地甲病重病區。

sentences.english: Today, I interviewed a woman who is terminally ill.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我採訪了一個病重的老婦人。

sentences.english: In very severe cases, she beated some persons and wanted to kill someone.
sentences.chinese: 病重時，她還要打人或要殺人。

sentences.english: Soon afterward, my boyfriend's father became very ill.
sentences.chinese: 就在那不久，男友的父親病重。

sentences.english: Mrs Smith seriously ill already hospitalize.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯夫人病重已住院。

sentences.english: It said that my aunt was seriously ill and she was staying in the hospital.
sentences.chinese: 電報上說，舅媽病重，住在蕪湖醫院。

definition: to be critically ill/to be terminally ill
to fall ill/to be stricken with an illness
on one's deathbed/at the point of death
to fall gravely ill, never to recover (idiom)
to be ill/to be in bad health
approaching one's end/with one foot in the grave
to leave one's mortal frame (idiom)/to die
old illness recurs (idiom); a relapse/fig. to repeat an old error/the same old problem
sudden attack of a serious illness
